remarks.para: A synchronization point at which threads can pair and swap elements within pairs. Each thread presents some object on entry to the method, matches with a partner thread, and receives its partner's object on return. An Exchanger may be viewed as a bidirectional form of a . Exchangers may be useful in applications such as genetic algorithms and pipeline designs.

those subsequent to a return from the corresponding exchange() in the other thread.
